edu.stanford.nlp.trees

Class TreeTokenizerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.nlp.trees.TreeTokenizerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IteratorFromReaderFactory<Tree>, TokenizerFactory<Tree>

    public class TreeTokenizerFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements TokenizerFactory<Tree>
    Wrapper for TreeReaderFactory. Any IOException in the readTree() method of the TreeReader will result in a null tree returned.
    Author:
    Roger Levy (rog@stanford.edu), javanlp
